name: dev-shell
about: This is a simple shell script to automate some tasks.

features.name: GITHUB OPERATIONS
features.description: Automating Github operations from adding tracked changes, adding gitignores, workflows, secrets and the likes

features.name: commit
features.description: Smart commit that creates a temporary branch, stages all tracked files, commits with a message that lists all changed files, then merges back to the original branch. This prevents accidental commits to main/master and provides a safety net.
features.why_useful: No more accidentally committing broken code to main branch. Automatic file listing in commit message for better history. One command instead of multiple git commands.
workflow: Check if there are changes to commit
Generate commit message with list of all files changed
